input2: The patient has an AneuRx stent graft which was placed on 5.4-cm aneurysm. Previous studies have shown some thrombus in the aortic component of the graft which is very interesting in light of the fact that in this year, he suffered a DVT of his left leg for uncertain reasons for which he is currently on Warfarin. He had a CT scan today.  He has had no other complaints and the swelling in his left leg has improved considerably.
